OS: Win10 | CPU: AMD Ryzen 5 5600G with Radeon Graphics 3.90 GHz | GPU: Nvidia GTX 1650 | RAM: 16

 

KSP 1 has a good way to show what type of control mode is currently using and whats going on (plane mode, docking mode, what key is being pressed).

Missing indication on what Key i am pressing (if the ship is receiving a W key press, or a S).

Missing indication that shows if it is in precise mode (low force - good for probes) or normal mode.

Missing indication of Trimmed Controls - How do I know if the plane is getting trimmed?
